src_original: SA.12 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee)  saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaṃ grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniḥśritya vihareyus te ca syuḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ teṣāṃ ca kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyeran vā śrūyeran vā prajñāyeran vā /
tgt_original: 若比丘隨所依止聚落，作惡行、污他家，皆見皆聞皆知。

src_original: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- āyuṣmantaḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ
yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi yuṣmākaṃ ca te
tgt_original: 『汝等作惡行、污他家，皆見皆聞皆知。

src_original: asmād āvāsād alaṃ yuṣmākaṃ iha vāseneti /
evaṃ cet te bhikṣavas tān bhikṣūn vadeyuḥ -- chandagāmina āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣava dveṣagāmino  mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya
tgt_original: 』是比丘語諸比丘言： 『諸比丘隨欲行、瞋行、怖行、癡行。 何以故？ 有如是同罪比丘，有驅者、有不驅者。

src_original: bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /  tatra bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- mā āyuṣmanta evaṃ vadata /
tgt_original: 』諸比丘語是比丘： 『汝莫作是語：

src_original: ekatya bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti
tgt_original: 「諸比丘隨欲行、瞋行、怖行、癡行。
